title: Ancient civilisation under eastern Turkey estimated to be 11k-13k years old
description: I am staring at about a dozen, stiff, eight-foot high, orange-red penises, carved from living bedrock, and semi-enclosed in an open chamber. A strange carved head (of a man, a demon, a priest, a God?), also hewn from the living rock, gazes at the phallic totems â€“ like a primitivist gargoyle. The exp...
